subject: Re: Mini Box on the Paranormal State site.
author: rosemary_guiley
full_text:
Hi Frank,

Yes, I did write about the MiniBox recently for Paranormal Insider --
I'm one of the bloggers.  But if you keep scrolling down in the tech
section, you will find my article FRANK'S BOX posted on Oct. 26 -- way
before I wrote about the MiniBox.  It wasn't a matter of giving the
Mini "top billing" -- I'd already given that to you.

Rosemary
